Uses of Class
org.neo4j.internal.batchimport.staging.Stage

  • Packages that use Stage 
    Package Description
    org.neo4j.internal.batchimport  
    org.neo4j.internal.batchimport.staging
    Generic staging framework and generic implementations of such used to execute batches in parallel.

    • Uses of Stage in org.neo4j.internal.batchimport

      Subclasses of Stage in org.neo4j.internal.batchimport 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  CountGroupsStage
      Stage for counting groups per node, populates RelationshipGroupCache.
      class  DeleteDuplicateNodesStage
      After IdMapper.prepare(PropertyValueLookup, Collector, ProgressListener) any duplicate input ids have been detected, i.e. also duplicate imported nodes.
      class  IdMapperPreparationStage
      Performs IdMapper.prepare(PropertyValueLookup, Collector, ProgressListener) embedded in a Stage as to take advantage of statistics and monitoring provided by that framework.
      class  NodeCountsAndLabelIndexBuildStage
      Counts nodes and their labels and also builds label index while doing so.
      class  NodeCountsStage
      Reads all records from NodeStore and process the counts in them, populating NodeLabelsCache for later use of RelationshipCountsStage.
      class  NodeDegreeCountStage
      Goes through RelationshipStore and increments counts per start/end node, calling NodeRelationshipCache.incrementCount(long).
      class  NodeFirstGroupStage
      Updates dense nodes with which will be the first group to point to, after a RelationshipGroupDefragmenter has been run.
      class  RelationshipCountsAndTypeIndexBuildStage
      Reads all records from RelationshipStore and process the counts in them.
      class  RelationshipCountsStage
      Reads all records from RelationshipStore and process the counts in them.
      class  RelationshipGroupStage
      Takes information about relationship groups in the NodeRelationshipCache, which is produced as a side-effect of linking relationships together, and writes them out into RelationshipGroupStore.
      class  RelationshipLinkbackStage
      Sets RelationshipRecord.setFirstPrevRel(long) and RelationshipRecord.setSecondPrevRel(long) by going through the RelationshipStore in reversed order.
      class  RelationshipLinkforwardStage  
      class  ScanAndCacheGroupsStage
      Scans RelationshipGroupRecord from store in reverse, this because during import the relationships are imported per type in descending type id order, i.e. with highest type first.
      class  SparseNodeFirstRelationshipStage
      Updates sparse node records with relationship heads after relationship linking.
      class  WriteGroupsStage
      Writes cached RelationshipGroupRecord from ScanAndCacheGroupsStage to store.
      Methods in org.neo4j.internal.batchimport with parameters of type Stage 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void ImportLogic.executeStage​(Stage stage)  
      private void RelationshipGroupDefragmenter.executeStage​(Stage stage)  

    • Uses of Stage in org.neo4j.internal.batchimport.staging

      Methods in org.neo4j.internal.batchimport.staging with parameters of type Stage 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void ExecutionSupervisors.superviseDynamicExecution​(ExecutionMonitor monitor, Configuration config, Stage stage)
      Supervises an execution with the given monitor AND a DynamicProcessorAssigner to give the execution a dynamic and optimal nature.
      static void ExecutionSupervisors.superviseDynamicExecution​(ExecutionMonitor monitor, Stage stage)
      With Configuration.DEFAULT.
      static void ExecutionSupervisors.superviseDynamicExecution​(Stage stage)
      Using an invisible monitor.
      static void ExecutionSupervisors.superviseExecution​(ExecutionMonitor monitor, Stage stage)
      Executes a number of stages simultaneously, letting the given monitor get insight into the execution.
